name: Name
add_wallet_description: Create a new wallet or restor from a backup
import_description: Restore wallet from seed or other backup material. Select if you want to import an existing wallet
supported_accounts_info: Supported HD accounts: BIP44, BIP46, BIP84
import_advanced_placeholder:
Enter one of the following:

- 12 - 24 word mnemonic
- Wallet descriptor (e.g., pkh(tprv...))
- Extended private key (e.g., x/y/z/tprv)
- Extended public key (e.g., x/y/z/tpub)
import_basic_placeholder:
Enter your 12 - 24 word mnemonic
or wallet descriptor (e.g., pkh(tprv...))
mnemonic_note: Please, back up your mnemonic. It is the only way to restore your wallet.
no_transactions_text: A list of transactions for this wallet will be displayed here
